attributes.action: Save junior doctors' time by examining pharmacy sheet prescription inscriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nationwide, if all widely, nurse prescribed (commonly known as PRN drugs) were printed instead of scribed by house officers, this would save time - just leave the box blank for their signature.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
